scenario: Auto template 1 with theater name error

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: hi....am buying a ticket tonight so we go and see a movie at AMC mountain 16

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: No problem. Is there a particular type of movie you’re looking for?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: hhhmmmmm not at all. i dont have any in mind for now

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: Sure. I can help with that. Let me listings at AMC Mercado 24.

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: sure you can but i want to see the movie at AMC mountain 16

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: Oh, sorry about that. So you’re interested in action films at AMC Mountain 16, right?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: yeah

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: OK. I show one action movie playing at AMC Mountain 16: No Time To Die. Remaining showtimes are 4:30pm, 6:40pm and 9:10pm. Does any of those work?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: yeah but 9.10pm will be perfect for me

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: Great. And how many tickets?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: myself and two other persons are going to see a movie

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: All right. Let me confirm that you’d like three tickets for No Time To Die at AMC Mountain 16 tonight at 9:10pm. Is that all correct?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: yeah

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: Is it OK to go ahead and purchase these tickets?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: yes you can

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: OK. Your tickets are purchased and details for how to proceed have been sent to your email address. Can I help with anything else?

utterances.speaker: user
utterances.text: ok thanks but i dont need anything again

utterances.speaker: assistant
utterances.text: OK. Enjoy your movie!
